column5: Its a home away from home for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. It's 16 min away from the D/FW airport. The downtown Dallas and downtown Forth Worth is 30 min far from my house. 24 hr Kroger is in walking distance and 24 hr Walmart is 10 min drive. YMCA, 24 hr fitness and many other everyday places are in 10-15 min radius.
